apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts a tender kiss between a man and a woman, rendered with Appleâ€™s signature soft rounded edges and a warm, inviting glow. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, beautifully captures a moment of intimacy and loving connection, perfect for expressing deep feelings in digital conversations.
